name: Almond Board of California
bossPosition: Vice President, Global Technical & Regulatory Affairs
goal: The Almond Board of California is a Federal Marketing Order enacted by almond growers in 1950.  Primary activities include marketing almonds around the global, environmental and nutrition research, food safety, and regulatory issues.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: The Almond Board follows all initiatives, policies, and legislation that will affect market access to almonds exporting to the European Union.
